summary: The client requested to rerun Sprint Plan SP-001, which Mike confirmed includes foundational user stories for employee directory search, mock login, and adding employee profiles. Mike initiated the rerun by saving the sprint and starting execution, estimated at 20 minutes, and suggested monitoring progress or planning the next sprint afterward.

decisions.title: Rerun Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Save the sprint with the same stories for continuity, no status updates needed, and kick off execution to build core navigation and directory foundation.

actions.task: Monitor Sprint SP-001 execution progress via dashboard
Decide on next steps: continue monitoring or plan following sprint after completion

backlog_deltas.title: Rerun sprint plan with existing stories (US-001, US-010, US-015)

risks.risk: Potential issues from previous re-execution attempts, especially with US-010 in progress
risks.mitigation: Rerun cleanly without updating story statuses to maintain continuity
